text: Bende joma nokiewo kodgi koa ka joka Isakar, joka Zebulun nyaka ka jo-Naftali nobiro koting始o chiemo e punde, ngamia, pundane kod rwedhi. Negikelo gik moko mang始eny machalo mogo, olembe mag ng始owu gi mag mzabibu motwo mong始in gi divai, gi mo, dhok kaachiel gi rombe nikech ne nitiere mor e Israel.
